reviews.review_msg: Believe don't take her class! Take other ITAL teacher's class! The mark she give is really unfair,this is 100 level class not 200 or 300 level but she always marks like it's a high level class. If you want get a fair and higher mark avoid this teacher!!!By the way, she's class is so boring and under pressure!
Her class is a bit dry. other than that she is a great teacher.
